derivation: probably identical with H3334 (יָצַר) (through the squeezing into shape); (compare H3331 (יַצַע));
outline:
1. to form, fashion, frame
    1. (Qal) to form, fashion
      1. of human activity
      2. of divine activity
        1. of creation
          1. of original creation
          2. of individuals at conception
          3. of Israel as a people
        2. to frame, pre-ordain, plan (fig. of divine) purpose of a situation)
      3. (Niphal) to be formed, be created
      4. (Pual) to be predetermined, be pre-ordained
      5. (Hophal) to be formed
kjv_def: [idiom] earthen, fashion, form, frame, make(-r), potter, purpose.
strongs_def: to mould into a form; especially as apotter; figuratively, to determine (i.e. form a resolution)
